sentences.en: Admittedly, long - range economic forecasting can go spectacularly awry.
sentences.cn: 诚然, 长期 经济预测可能极其不靠谱.

sentences.en: He volleyed the ball spectacularly into the far corner of the net.
sentences.cn: 他一脚漂亮的凌空抽射，把球踢进了球门的远角。

sentences.en: Instead it has failed spectacularly and there are now more than ever.
sentences.cn: 然而明显他失败了,现在却比以往更多.

sentences.en: Lately, a few of those bets have gone spectacularly wrong.
sentences.cn: 最近, 这些预期与现实大相径庭.

sentences.en: Many of her movies had been spectacularly successful.
sentences.cn: 她的很多电影都获得了巨大的成功。
那个地区的景色非常壮观.

sentences.en: The one real novelty, nuclear power , went spectacularly off the rails.
sentences.cn: 核动力是唯一真正新奇的事物, 它却令人震惊地偏离了轨道.

sentences.en: The tightly controlled border rapidly loosened up. Since then, cross border co - operation has been spectacularly successful.
sentences.cn: 受到严格控制的边境迅速放开限制. 此后, 跨境合作一直非常成功.

sentences.en: They were spectacularly good horsemen, which is about the only thing history can say of them.
sentences.cn: 他们是极为出色的骑手, 这也许是他们在历史上的唯一亮点.

sentences.en: Was he even spectacularly sick, exceptionally blind, extraordinarily degraded?
sentences.cn: 难道他真的一身病态, 格外愚昧, 特别堕落 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 壮观的，惊人的；公开展示的
景象，奇观；眼镜；引人羡慕的人
奇放线菌素，[微] 壮观霉素，奇霉素

trans.tran_cn: 壮观地, 令人吃惊地
